text: Winona Sammon, more well known as Peggy Shannon (January 10, 1907 â€“ May 11, 1941) was an American actress. She acted on stage and in movie roles during the 1920s and 1930s. She had many movies during her short career. She was born in Pine Bluff, Arkansas. In May 1941, Shannon died in Los Angeles after a heart attack Category:People from Pine Bluff, Arkansas Category:American movie actors category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Arkansas Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:1907 births Category:1941 deaths
title: Peggy Shannon
